thread.title: Novak Djokovic caught bickering with his wife Jelena
thread.title_full: Novak Djokovic caught bickering with his wife Jelena

title: Novak Djokovic caught bickering with his wife Jelena
text: Novak Djokovic is caught bickering with his wife as she tells him off for being rudeâ€¦ unaware that their Facebook Live broadcast is still running Novak Djokovic's wife Jelena was filming his training session on Tuesday As the session finished, Djokovic, 29, walked toward the camera thanking his fans for watching But he took the camera from his wife's hands, saying it's 'more intimate' if he holds the recorder She then turns to him and asks: 'Where are your manners, huh?' Jelena then looks down at her phone and quickly turns off the recording
